attributes.action: Postpone the rollout of 5G in the UK, pending further independent investigation.
attributes.additional_details:
More than 230 scientists and doctors worldwide have emphasised the potential health risks to the EU:

http://www.5gappeal.eu

The Brussels region has already postponed the rollout of 5G due to the associated health risks.
attributes.background: This is an appeal to postpone the rollout of 5G in the UK, pending the outcome of an independent investigation. 5G will increase exposure to radiofrequency electromagnetic fields RF-EMF, that has been proven to be harmful for humans and the environment.
